body_html:
I think we need a solution to this problem even if we don't do it in a separate process. We could probably do a copy to pinned memory in the main process in a thread which releases the GIL.

cudaHostRegister has a cudaHostRegisterPortable flag which allows the memory to be used by other cuda contexts. I had assumed this meant other processes as well. It sounds like someone got it to work in the forum post below:

https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/510439/share-gpu-host-pinned-memory-between-host-processes/?offset=6
